meanings.definition: The quality or state of being massive.
meanings.sent1: The massivenesses of the mountain range left us in awe.
meanings.sent2: The elephant's massivenesses made it stand out in the zoo.
meanings.sent3: The massivenesses of the cake was so impressive that we couldn't finish it all.
meanings.sent4: The massivenesses of the storm cloud darkened the sky ominously.
meanings.sent5: The massivenesses of the ancient tree trunk hinted at its long history.

meanings.definition: The large size or extent of something.
meanings.sent1: The massivenesses of the ship made it visible from afar.
meanings.sent2: The massivenesses of the library impressed all the visitors.
meanings.sent3: The massivenesses of the ice cream cone made it a challenge to finish.
meanings.sent4: The massivenesses of the waterfall created a mesmerizing sight.
meanings.sent5: The massivenesses of the skyscraper towered over the city skyline.

meanings.definition: The imposing or overwhelming nature of something.
meanings.sent1: The massivenesses of the responsibility weighed heavily on his shoulders.
meanings.sent2: The massivenesses of the task seemed daunting at first.
meanings.sent3: The massivenesses of the challenge motivated her to push harder.
meanings.sent4: The massivenesses of the decision loomed over him like a dark cloud.
meanings.sent5: The massivenesses of the crowd at the concert added to the excitement.
